greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = d(n) + phi(n), where d(n) is the number of divisors (A000005) and phi(n) is Euler's totient function (A000010).
comment: If d(n) increases phi(n) tends to go down so the sum has a significance.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b061468.txt", n, " ", numdiv(n) + eulerphi(n)) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 23 2009
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 04 2001
ext: More terms from Winston C. Yang (winston(AT)cs.wisc.edu), May 19 2001
